channel.title: Uhm Help with a spec?
channel.description:
i need help with this... [code] hitDiff = 10 + playerMaxHit; [/code] When a player uses a spec for instance
Player 1 uses dragon longsword special. When player 1 uses it. player 2 hits 10+ then normal on player 1. heres my full special
[code] public void DragonLongSpecial(){ hitDiff = 10 - playerMaxHit; //Hit dif inCombat(); //In combat staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100); //Animation setAnimation(1058); //emote actionTimer = 25; //Timer to reset animation teleportToX = absX; // not to move teleportToY = absY; //not to move xD
} [/code] And also how do i add timer on it??

item.title: Uhm Help with a spec?
item.dc:creator: @dorkinator dorkinator
item.description:
@dorkinator wrote:

Why do you need a timer if you alredy have a spec limint? they can only do it so many times beafor they stop, also there is a TUT some ware with the spec stuff in it.

item.title: Uhm Help with a spec?
item.dc:creator: @yoshimtu yoshimtu
item.description:
@yoshimtu wrote:

i need help with thisâ€¦

	hitDiff = 10 + playerMaxHit;

When a player uses a spec for instance

Player 1 uses dragon longsword special. When player 1 uses it. player 2 hits 10+ then normal on player 1.
heres my full special

public void DragonLongSpecial(){								  
	hitDiff = 10 - playerMaxHit;				//Hit dif
	inCombat();			//In combat
	staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100);	//Animation
	setAnimation(1058);			//emote
	actionTimer = 25;		//Timer to reset animation
	teleportToX = absX;			// not to move
	teleportToY = absY;			//not to move xD

}

And also how do i add timer on it??

Read full topic
